dundee.dominant_trees: 100+ year-old Bur Oaks, Sycamores, and Silver Maples
dundee.common_issues: crown stabilization for aging giants and clearance pruning for overhead power lines
dundee.local_risk: Many large limbs overhang historic slate roofs and narrow driveways, requiring rigging experts, not just 'guys with ropes'.
dundee.meta_snippet: Specializing in historic Bur Oak preservation and tight-quarter rigging.

benson.dominant_trees: Silver Maples, Hackberries, and aging Elms
benson.common_issues: storm damage cleanup from brittle Silver Maples and alleyway clearance for utilities
benson.local_risk: Most tree removals here require navigating tight alleys and detached garages.
benson.meta_snippet: Expert alleyway removals and storm cleanup for brittle Silver Maples.

millard.dominant_trees: Pin Oaks, Green Ash, and Linden trees
millard.common_issues: Iron Chlorosis (yellowing leaves) in Pin Oaks and Emerald Ash Borer treatments
millard.local_risk: Sidewalk heaving from surface roots is a major code violation issue in these subdivisions.
millard.meta_snippet: Treating Pin Oak chlorosis and hazardous Ash tree removals.

westside.common_issues: deadwooding to prevent limb drop on manicured lawns
westside.local_risk: These large lots often have 'widow maker' limbs high in the canopy that go unnoticed.
westside.meta_snippet: High-canopy deadwooding and aesthetic pruning for estate properties.

tiburon.common_issues: structural splitting of ornamental Pear trees during high winds
tiburon.local_risk: Heavy clay soil compaction often suffocates young maples, requiring air-spading or deep root fertilization.
tiburon.meta_snippet: Preventing Pear tree splitting and correcting clay soil compaction.

the-ridges.dominant_trees: Blue Spruce, White Pine, and ornamental screens
the-ridges.common_issues: needle cast disease in Spruce trees and shaping privacy hedges
the-ridges.local_risk: Bagworms can decimate a privacy screen in weeks if not caught early.
the-ridges.meta_snippet: Disease management for Blue Spruce and privacy screen maintenance.
